entry.title: Swordfish - Favorite Clothes - lyric

link.title: Swordfish - Favorite Clothes - lyric

entry.content:
blow out the candles, and turn out the lights
I don't think that we can synthesize until you're as empty as I feel on the inside
but I've been there before, I know how it goes
there's distress in your voice, intonations on phones
and you start wearing holes through your favorite clothes
they're familiar, they smell like, not being alone

I haven't clipped my nails, so the first thing you'll feel is sharp
and while we're dancing in the shadows, I'll embrace my fear of the dark
because there's these things that you do and the things that you say
the way that you feel and you make me okay
and I know that I can't be dependent on you
because one day you'll be gone and I won't know what to do
and every time I digress I put myself in a place
and if I stay there too long, I can't remember your face
there's the colors, the contours, the flush of your cheeks
the way that I slept and the grinding of teeth
